attributes.action: Use Half the AID Budget to fix the NHS and Social Care System crises.
attributes.additional_details:
When we have paid off our Debts and stopped borrowing more money we can then look at giving further AID in the future.
We are not a rich Country as we keep being told.
We have a Debt of One and a Half Trillion Pounds and borrow a further 60 Billion Pounds each year on top of this amount.
This Debt could fund the NHS fully for a further 15 years.
attributes.background: We have a crises in the NHS and Social Care because we do not have any money left to fix these key areas due to austerity. We borrow 60 Billion Pound a year and then give 14 Billion Pounds a year away as AID, often to Countries who don't need it. We do not have enough money to fund our own Services.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/177200
